citations.narrative:
Item Annual Report 2.36 b 3
The IACUC approved a protocol in the previous year which gave the investigator an exception to the canine
exercise program because of scientific justification. The institution did not provide a summary of the exception as
required on its annual report to the USDA that it submitted last year.
The facility needs to submit an amended annual report to the USDA indicating any and all exceptions .
Correct from this day 5/12/14
An exit interview took place at the end of inspection
